pages.text: The $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(/l)'s main use is the production of $(item)Slates$(). Each tier of slate requires the previous tier and a more powerful altar than the last. $(br2)Note that $(item)Etherial Slates$() aren't currently implemented by default, but may be if you're playing in a modpack. Check JEI for details.
